text:
prostol can be used:
o Mifepristone 200mg orally in an outpatient setting, followed 12-24 hours later by
o Misoprostol 100µg vaginally or buccal or sublingual every 4-6 hours (limit dosing to 5 times)
o If there is a previous CD scar, do not use misoprostol or consult with a specialist first.
• If the pregnancy is 20-26 weeks, a higher dose of misoprostol can be used:
o Mifepristone 200mg orally in an outpatient setting, followed 12-24 hours later by
o Misoprostol 200µg vaginally or buccal or su
